description: A long tube with a trigger at the end.  The tube can hold a single 40mm grenade, which it can fire at the target when mounted onto the underbarrel of a gun or onto a dedicated standalone frame.

variants.description: A Picatinny-mounted launcher for 40mm grenades.  Measuring at 12.5″, it is half an inch longer as its military cousin, the M203A1, and 2.5″ shorter than the M203.  Can be mounted onto any gun with a long-enough bottom rail.  Alternatively, it can be mounted onto a dedicated frame in order to be used in a stand-alone configuration, without requiring a gun.  <variant:black>

description: A long tube with a trigger and a grip on one end, and a foregrip on the other.  The tube can hold a single 40mm grenade, which it can fire at the target when mounted onto the underbarrel of a gun or in a standalone configuration with a dedicated buttstock.

variants.description: A Picatinny-mounted launcher for 40mm grenades.  This model replaces M203, and comes with a modern sight and a foregrip.  Can be mounted onto any gun with a long-enough bottom rail.  Alternatively, it can be connected with a dedicated buttstock in order to be used in a stand-alone configuration, without requiring a gun.  <variant:black>
